mission.title: Injongo Yethu
mission.text: Sikholelwa ukuba wonke umntu ufanelwe ithuba lokufunda ukufunda. Iqonga lethu libonelela ngemfundo yasimahla, efikelelekayo yokufunda nokubhala ngeelwimi zaseMzantsi Afrika nangaphaya.

crisis.title: Ingxaki Yokufunda Nokubhala
crisis.text: UMzantsi Afrika ujamelene nezinga elibi lokufunda nokubhala phakathi kwamazwe afanayo. Uphando lubonisa ukuba u-78% wabafundi beGrade 4 abakwazi ukufunda ngokuqonda.

causes.title: Kutheni Oku Kusenzeka
causes.poverty: Ubuhlwempu buyathintela ukufikelela kwiincwadi nakwizixhobo zokufunda

solution.title: Sinceda Njani
solution.text: Iqonga lethu lisebenzisa iindlela ezibonisiweyo ukunceda abantu ukufunda ukufunda kuyo nayiphi na iminyaka.

footer.mission: Ukunceda abantu baseMzantsi Afrika nabo bonke abase-Afrika ukufunda ukufunda, igama ngalinye ngexesha.
